examples.en: She is my best girl.
We had a little girl.
Girls! Please be quiet.
That girl's got class!
She's a really weird girl.
Stop annoying the girl.
She plays the coy girl.
Hey, girl. What's up?
examples.ru: Привет, подруга. Как дела? (амер. разг., женщина обращается к хорошей знакомой)

examples.en: That girl is always hungry.
She's ever such a nice girl.
A small girl was eating an ice cream.
Time for bed, girls!
Is this your little girl?
The girl pouted.
Listen to me, my girl!
She's a tall, angular girl.
She's one girl in a million.
examples.ru: Это самая лучшая девушка на свете.

examples.en: Less of your sauce, my girl!
A small girl rushed past her.
Teri seemed like a nice girl.
The girl stuck her tongue out.
They have two girls and a boy.
examples.ru: У них две девочки и мальчик. / У них две дочери и сын.

examples.en: Bring me the stick. Good girl!
examples.ru: Принеси мне палку. Вот умница! (обращаясь к собаке)

examples.en: Ellen was a shy, reserved girl.
examples.ru: Эллен была застенчивой и замкнутой девушкой.

examples.en: Let us toast the birthday girl!
The girl was frantic with fear.
They were fighting over a girl.
He ogles at every girl he meets.
examples.ru: Он пялится на всех встречных девчонок.

examples.en: The patient was a girl of twelve.
He is accused of raping the girl.
examples.ru: Его обвиняют в изнасиловании этой девушки.
